text: "Live Wire" is a 1982 debut single from American heavy metal band Mötley Crüe. It is from their first studio album Too Fast for Love. In 2019 it went to number 24 in the Billboard rock chart. ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Mötley Crüe songs
title: Live Wire (Mötley Crüe song)
